entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
